author: Daniel Prendergast
title: Cops arrest creep who mugged elderly woman in elevator | New York Post
text:
Police busted the cold-hearted creep who mugged an old lady in a Bronx elevator , authorities said Tuesday.
SEE ALSO 
Elderly woman mugged in elevator of her own building 0:0 The man seen here mugged an 81-year-old woman in the... Homer Griffin, 50, followed the 81-year-old victim onto the the elevator at the building on Grand Concourse and Marcy Place around 2:20 p.m. Friday, cops said.
Surveillance video shows Griffin acting as though he is going to help the elderly woman with her shopping cart.
But when she tried to leave, he pulled out a sharp object, cornered her, and demanded money.
He snatched $200 from her purse and then fled, cops said.
Police captured him after receiving a tip from someone in the community.
Griffin was charged with robbery, menacing, and possession of a weapon.
